resources.string: Have one person shake their device. Everyone else, stand still.
Looking for a device to connect to
Select A device to connect to
Please make sure to Make a Call

These are the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy of This application. This application which provides you the service of Walkie-Talkie. This privacy policy provides an overview about how we process personal data about users of our mobile applications we provide to you.We will not share your personal information anyone excepts as described in the privacy policy

This application respects your right to privacy. Your ability to make informed choices about the use of your information is important to us. We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Services to you.
Permissions in this Application are the Following

We may change this privacy policy from time to time by posting the most current privacy policy and its effective date. In case we change this privacy policy substantially, we may bring such changes to your attention by explicit notice in this page.
We do not include or offer third-party products or services in our application.

Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.
Hey check out this app. It lets you talk to your buddies like walkie talkie do.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
Wifi needed to establish call. Please turn on wifi.
Receive calls while App is closed
You will be able to receive calls even when walkie talkie is not running.

string-array.name: slices_desc
string-array.item: Inorder to call, this app requires Location permission to find their device
Select a searched device to Connect the call
After sending connection request, receiving persone need to accept the call by clicking accept.
Hold this button and then speak. Only one of you can talk at a time.
To End a call press End Call.

resources.string: Communcate with the user by connecting.
"Connect to Walkman,\nTalk to friends in nearby radius. "
Make a call to other Side to connect
Press and Hold Button to Speak
